txt.en:
'I see that you have recently gained access to the Cook's Guild, friend. That is a great achievement on the path of crafting.

'The Guild is a faction that can grant eligible crafters advantages in their trade. In the beginning, you can access better recipes than what you normally find in the world. As you increase in reputation, you gain access to yet more recipes.

'It is never too early to start building your reputation with the Cook's Guild. The leader can be found in the Shire, in the town of Michel Delving.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The Guilds are Reputation factions that grant advantages in recipe execution. Reputation is increased by bartering special crafted items.</rgb>

'I see that you have recently gained access to the Cook's Guild, friend. That is a great achievement on the path of crafting.

'The Guild is a faction that can grant eligible crafters advantages in their trade. In the beginning, you can access better recipes than what you normally find in the world. As you increase in reputation, you gain access to yet more recipes.

'It is never too early to start building your reputation with the Cook's Guild. The leader can be found in the Shire, in the town of Michel Delving.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The Guilds are Reputation factions that grant advantages in recipe execution. Reputation is increased by bartering special crafted items.</rgb>
Introduction: Cook's Guild

'I see that you have recently gained access to the Cook's Guild, friend. That is a great achievement on the path of crafting.

'The Guild is a faction that can grant eligible crafters advantages in their trade. In the beginning, you can access better recipes than what you normally find in the world. As you increase in reputation, you gain access to yet more recipes.

'It is never too early to start building your reputation with the Cook's Guild. The leader can be found in the Shire, in the town of Michel Delving.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The Guilds are Reputation factions that grant advantages in recipe execution. Reputation is increased by bartering special crafted items.</rgb>

'I see that you have recently gained access to the Cook's Guild, friend. That is a great achievement on the path of crafting.

'The Guild is a faction that can grant eligible crafters advantages in their trade. In the beginning, you can access better recipes than what you normally find in the world. As you increase in reputation, you gain access to yet more recipes.

'It is never too early to start building your reputation with the Cook's Guild. The leader can be found in the Shire, in the town of Michel Delving.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The Guilds are Reputation factions that grant advantages in recipe execution. Reputation is increased by bartering special crafted items.</rgb>
The Guild-leader offers you reputation in exchange for crafted items
'You should speak with the leader of the Cook's Guild immediately!'

'I see that you have recently gained access to the Cook's Guild, friend. That is a great achievement on the path of crafting.

'The Guild is a faction that can grant eligible crafters advantages in their trade. In the beginning, you can access better recipes than what you normally find in the world. As you increase in reputation, you gain access to yet more recipes.

'It is never too early to start building your reputation with the Cook's Guild. The leader can be found in the Shire, in the town of Michel Delving.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The Guilds are Reputation factions that grant advantages in recipe execution. Reputation is increased by bartering special crafted items.</rgb>
Honesty Goodbody offers many important recipes
'You should speak with the leader of the Cook's Guild immediately!'

'Welcome to the Cook's Guild! This is an excellent faction for Cooks who are looking to benefit from their expertise.

'As the leader of this faction, it is my role to oversee the advancement of your reputation as you trade your items in. I will gladly collect everything you make from our own Guild recipes!

'To collect the recipes to make the items I seek, you should speak with Honesty Goodbody, then with Annie Hayworst. They will help you to get started.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The role of the Guild-leader is to trade crafted, barterable items in exchange for reputation with the Guild.</rgb>
Annie Hayhurst offers advantageous rewards for members of the Cook's Guild
Aesseledh, the Cook's Guild-leader, is in the Cook's Guild-hall in Michel Delving.\n\nThe Master of Crafting Guilds has instructed you to speak with Aesseledh to learn more about the Cook's Guild.
'You should speak with the leader of the Cook's Guild immediately!'

'You will notice that I have many new recipes for sale. As your crafting ability increases, more recipes will become available, so check back with me often!

'The items of repast are made from the recipes I sell; those items are the ones you may give to Aesseledh in exchange for reputation. This is the only way to gain reputation. It's best to start early!'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: This Recipe Vendor sells the recipes that let you create unique barter items. The output items are traded for reputation with the Guild.</rgb>
Honesty Goodbody is in the Cook's Guild-hall in Michel Delving.\n\nAesseledh has directed you to speak with Honesty Goodbody to look at what recipes she sells.
'You should speak with the leader of the Cook's Guild immediately!'

'I'm the vendor you should come to when you're ready to reap your rewards. I might not have anything you can use just yet, but my recipes will be available once you advance your reputation with us!

'The goods that you can make from my recipes are far superior to any other recipe you find and will guarantee the utmost success in crafting. Make sure you come back again once you reach Acquaintance level with the Cook's Guild!'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The improved recipes sold at this vendor are the rewards for gaining reputation with the Guild.</rgb>
Annie Hayhurst is in the Cook's Guild-hall in Michel Delving.\n\nAesseledh has directed you to speak with Annie Hayhurst to look at what recipes she sells.
'You should speak with the leader of the Cook's Guild immediately!'
'You should speak with the leader of the Cook's Guild immediately!'
'You should speak with Honesty Goodbody immediately!'
'You should speak with Annie Hayhurst at once.'
Talk to Aesseledh, the Cook's Guild-leader
Talk to the repast recipe vendor
Talk to the vendor who sells improved recipes
The Cook's Guild is a society for the finest cooks throughout Middle-earth.

'I see that you have recently gained access to the Cook's Guild, friend. That is a great achievement on the path of crafting.

'The Guild is a faction that can grant eligible crafters advantages in their trade. In the beginning, you can access better recipes than what you normally find in the world. As you increase in reputation, you gain access to yet more recipes.

'It is never too early to start building your reputation with the Cook's Guild. The leader can be found in the Shire, in the town of Michel Delving.'

<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: The Guilds are Reputation factions that grant advantages in recipe execution. Reputation is increased by bartering special crafted items.</rgb>
